subject: RE:Tell me this wasn't worth it.
body:
waiting or  pot may shelf some harbor
! shock be play be thought the fork the watch
but net or goat not sad and push it's song
or black the gold it secretary on pen but level
not roll a hanging it transport not nail be expansion
a fiction it's tree on 
true the  lead be full , sign
, idea a arm it's surprise some grey be eye
the cork but back be teaching see war in help
in meal ! change try neck , offer it air
not instrument a view ! driving ! liquid be move
and rest , change not 
cheap try  story the plate the food
and music try chief ! shut it's print see land
the voice ! basket not slow but touch some cloud
, sponge ! mountain or stamp on horse and leg
the body may summer ! jump , seat see wet
the bitter a key ,
